description.name: eurcsol
description.tagline: EURC Solana Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto sol-eurc Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept EURC Solana directly on your website
Unique sol/eurc receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your sol/eurc wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
